org.flixel.tweens.FlxTween

type
class
subclasses
org.flixel.tweens.misc.MultiVarTween

Constructor

public new(duration : Float, ?type : TweenType, ?complete : CompleteCallback, ?ease : org.flixel.tweens.util.EaseFunction)
Constructor. Specify basic information about the Tween.
Parameters:
duration - Duration of the tween (in seconds or frames).
type - Tween type, one of Tween.PERSIST (default), Tween.LOOPING, or Tween.ONESHOT.
complete - Optional callback for when the Tween completes.
ease - Optional easer function to apply to the Tweened value.

Instance Variables

private _ease : org.flixel.tweens.util.EaseFunction

private _finish : Bool

private _next : FriendTween

private _parent : org.flixel.FlxBasic

private _prev : FriendTween

private _t : Float

private _target : Float

private _time : Float

private _type : TweenType

public active : Bool

public complete : CompleteCallback

public percent(getPercent,setPercent) : Float

public scale(getScale,null) : Float

Instance Methods

private finish() : Void

private getPercent() : Float

private getScale() : Float

private setPercent(value : Float) : Float

public start() : Void

Starts the Tween, or restarts it if it's currently running.

public update() : Void

Updates the Tween, called by World.
